c74object.name: zsa.spread~
c74object.digest:
zsa.spread~
returns the spectral spread, i.e., the variance around the spectral baricenter
c74object.description:
As usual, we consider the spectral centroid as the first moment of spectra, considered as a frequency distribution, which is related with the weighted frequency mean value. The spectral spread is the second moment, i.e., the variance of the mean calculated for the spectral centroid. The object works in the spectral domain, so you need to use it whithin
pfft~
.

method.name: signal
method.description:
If both signal inlets are connected, left signal inlet expects real values and right inlet expects imaginary values. If the left inlet is the only signal connected input, the signal is interpreted as the energy (you need to calculate it using
cartopol~
or better
zsa.energy~
).

attribute.name: threshold
attribute.description:
threshold
sets noise threshold in linear scale (the default value is 0.0). It helps
zsa.spread~
to avoid calculating values on unwanted smaller low amplitude data.
